column2: Job Title:  Store Keeper cum Admin Assistant Location:  MIDC, Navi Mumbai Job Type:  Full-time Company Description:  The Golden Frequency is an audio visual integration firm located in MIDC, Navi Mumbai. We are dedicated to providing quality electronic goods. We are currently seeking a detail-oriented and organized individual to join our team as a Store Keeper cum Admin Assistant. Job Description:  The Store Keeper cum Admin Assistant will be responsible for managing inventory, record-keeping, and providing administrative support. The ideal candidate will have a graduation in any stream or higher educational qualification, proven experience in storekeeping or a similar role, and strong organizational and time management skills. Responsibilities: Take inventory of incoming and outgoing stock, maintaining proper docket numbers and bill details in detailed record-keeping basis. Reconcile inventory on a daily basis in terms of opening and closing stock, and report numbers to the Management.va Coordinate with labor to move inventory on the shop floor from the time of delivery to the time of send-off. Maintain administrative records as well as office management for further audits and reconciliation. Coordinate with the accountant to maintain petty cash and reconciliation of the same. Provide timely updates to Management regarding inventory and stock position, as well as generate regular reports for Management Review. Requirements: Graduation in any stream or higher educational qualification is a must Proven experience in storekeeping or a similar role Familiarity with inventory management software is a plus Strong organizational and time management skills Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities Ability to work independently and as part of a team Proficiency in MS Office suite (Word, Excel, Outlook) Benefits: Competitive salary Professional development opportunities How to Apply:  Please submit your resume and a cover letter outlining your qualifications and interest in the position to vabhobe@gmail.com. Note:  Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. Thank you for your interest in joining The Golden Frequency team.
